metadata.titleEn: One belt, one road, the human development index (1990-2019)
metadata.titleCn: "一带一路"沿线国家人类发展指数（1990-2019）
metadata.description: 1) the Human Development Index (HDI - the Human Development Index) to measure the level of the member states of the United Nations economic and social Development indicators, is the result of the GNP Index challenge to traditional;2) this data comes from the United Nations development programme (UNDP) statistical data;3) from the dynamic human development index to reflect the development status of human, reveals the priority to the development of a country, the development policies for countries all over the world especially in developing countries have provided the certain basis, thereby helping to excavate a country's economic development potential;4) data covers all the way "area" 64 1 countries along the (Chinese), 1990-2019, a total of 29 data, in the heart of the "One Belt And One Road" related research application is very broad.
metadata.descriptionCn: 人类发展指数（Human Development Index），简称HDI，是由联合国开发计划署（UNDP）在《1990年人文发展报告》中提出的，用以衡量联合国各成员国经济社会发展水平的指标，是对传统的GNP指标挑战的结果。本数据是在联合国开发计划署（UNDP）公布的统计数据基础上，针对部分缺失数据，通过查找文献，将现有数据拟合、回归等处理环节，查漏补缺，形成了覆盖"一带一路"64+1（中国）个沿线国家，时间序列为1990-2019年，后续将根据“一带一路“国家范围的扩大，持续增加数据覆盖的国家区域。
metadata.instructions:
The name of the human development index document is "silkrad"_ HDI(1990-2019).xls"
The data can be read and used by Excel software.
metadata.instructionsCn:
人类发展指数文件的名称为“silkroad_HDI(1990-2019).xls"
数据用EXCEL软件可读取使用。

background: The increased polarization on the Brazilian political scene was at its peak on the 2018 general elections. One such indicator is the Municipal Human Development Index (MHDI), a metric for the level of development and quality of life of a municipality. MHDI is derived from the Human Development Index (HDI), a global indicator which is one of the most widely accepted metrics for representing the development status of a country. Like the HDI, the MHDI is composed by three sub-indices: (1) MHDI Education, (2) MHDI Income and (3) MHDI Longevity that, together, offer a detailed view about the development status of a municipality. Conventional knowledge in Brazil states that left-wing parties are the preferred choice for voters residing in less developed regions, where basic needs in education, sanitation, health and food remain unmet, while centrist and right-wing parties tend to be preferred by voters residing in more developed regions, where basic needs usually have been met and the main concerns revolve around employment, security and economic development.
research objective: The objective of this paper is to empirically examine this hypothesis by using population size, MHDI and all its sub-indices as potential predictors of the election results on each municipality.
challenges: To our knowledge, there is no published work regarding the prediction of presidential election results in Brazil, particularly using the development status of each municipality as a potential predictor of election outcomes.
methods: To achieve our main goal, we employed six different supervised classification algorithms to predict the winner of the election on each municipality. As potential predictors, we used the MHDI general index, each of its three sub-indices (education, income and longevity) and the population size of the municipality.
dataset: MHDI and all its sub-indices are calculated based on Brazilian census data, which is publicly available.
findings: The results reached 87% of accuracy when using the education and income sub-indices as predictors of the elections. Based on the results obtained, we were able to confirm that municipalities with higher values for education and income sub-indices overwhelmingly preferred the right-wing candidate, while the left-wing option was preferred by those with lower values of the same sub-indices.
backgroundCn: 巴西政治舞台上的极化在2018年大选时达到了顶峰。一个这样的指标是市人类发展指数（MHDI），这是衡量一个市镇发展水平和生活质量的指标。MHDI源自人类发展指数（HDI），这是一个全球指标，是代表一个国家发展状态的最广泛接受的指标之一。与HDI一样，MHDI由三个子指数组成：（1）MHDI教育，（2）MHDI收入和（3）MHDI寿命，这三个子指数共同提供了关于市镇发展状态的详细视图。传统观念认为，在巴西，左翼政党是居住在发展水平较低地区选民的首选，这些地区的教育、卫生、食品和基本需求仍未得到满足，而中间派和右翼政党则更受居住在发展水平较高地区选民的青睐，这些地区的基本需求通常已得到满足，主要关注就业、安全和经济发展。
research objectiveCn: 本文的目的是通过使用人口规模、MHDI及其所有子指数作为潜在预测变量，实证检验这一假设对各个市镇选举结果的影响。
challengesCn: 据我们所知，目前没有关于预测巴西总统选举结果的已发表研究，特别是使用各个市镇的发展状况作为选举结果潜在预测因素的研究。
methodsCn: 为了实现我们的主要目标，我们采用了六种不同的监督分类算法来预测每个市镇的选举赢家。作为潜在的预测变量，我们使用了MHDI综合指数、其三个子指数（教育、收入和寿命）以及市镇的人口规模。
datasetCn: MHDI及其所有子指数是基于巴西人口普查数据计算的，这些数据是公开的。
findingsCn: 结果显示，当使用教育和收入子指数作为选举预测变量时，准确率达到了87%。根据获得的结果，我们能够确认，教育和收入子指数值较高的市镇压倒性地偏向于右派候选人，而那些子指数值较低的市镇则更倾向于左派选项。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the Human Development Index (HDI) dataset for the '一带一路' countries include data from 1990 to 2019?
Verification.QuestionCn: 人类发展指数（HDI）数据集是否包括'一带一路'国家1990年至2019年的数据？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the methods used to predict election results in municipalities more often based on supervised classification algorithms, unsupervised learning, or heuristic approaches?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 用于预测市政选举结果的方法更常基于监督分类算法、无监督学习还是启发式方法？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the strategies used to address missing data in datasets related to the Human Development Index across '一带一路' countries?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在与“一带一路”国家相关的人类发展指数数据集中，处理缺失数据的策略有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the data for calculating the Municipal Human Development Index (MHDI) typically sourced from?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 计算市级人类发展指数（MHDI）所需的数据通常来源于哪些地方？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to address missing data in human development indices for the countries along the Belt and Road Initiative?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于解决“一带一路”沿线国家人类发展指数缺失数据的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves using existing statistical data from the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and employing techniques like literature review, data fitting, and regression to address and fill in missing data for the Human Development Index for countries along the Belt and Road Initiative.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及使用联合国开发计划署（UNDP）现有的统计数据，并采用文献综述、数据拟合和回归等技术来解决和填补“一带一路”沿线国家人类发展指数的缺失数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that correlates development indices with electoral outcomes in a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个将发展指数与特定地区选举结果相关联的数据集示例是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example dataset is the Municipal Human Development Index (MHDI) of Brazil, which includes sub-indices for education, income, and longevity, derived from Brazilian census data, and is used to analyze correlations with electoral outcomes in municipalities.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个示例数据集是巴西的市级人类发展指数（MHDI），该指数包括教育、收入和寿命的子指数，这些数据来源于巴西的人口普查数据，并用于分析市级选举结果的相关性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a challenge faced when using a development index as a predictor in political analysis?
Example.QuestionCn: 在政治分析中使用发展指数作为预测工具时面临的一个挑战是，发展指数可能无法充分反映一个国家或地区的政治动态和社会复杂性。
Example.AnswerEn: An example challenge is the lack of published work that predicts presidential election results using the development status of each municipality as a predictor, which involves overcoming methodological gaps and ensuring accurate classification in political analysis.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子挑战是缺乏利用每个市镇的发展状态作为预测因素来预测总统选举结果的已发表研究，这涉及克服方法论差距并确保政治分析中的准确分类。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes of municipal development are captured by the Municipal Human Development Index (MHDI), and how do these attributes aid in analyzing political or election outcomes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 市政人类发展指数（MHDI）捕捉了哪些市政发展的属性，这些属性如何有助于分析政治或选举结果？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over how many years does the HDI dataset for the '一带一路' initiative provide data?
Quantification.QuestionCn: '一带一路'倡议的HDI数据集提供了多少年的数据？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by '查漏补缺' in the context of developing datasets for international indices?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在国际指标数据集开发的背景下，“查漏补缺”指的是识别和填补数据集中的空白或不足之处，以确保数据的完整性和准确性。
Definition.AnswerEn: '查漏补缺' means identifying and addressing gaps in the dataset by finding missing data or information, which involves using methods like literature review and data modeling to ensure comprehensive coverage of the '一带一路' countries.
Definition.AnswerCn: '查漏补缺' 意味着通过寻找缺失的数据或信息来识别和解决数据集中的空白，这涉及使用文献综述和数据建模等方法，以确保对 '一带一路' 国家进行全面覆盖。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the data collection method for the Human Development Index (HDI) in '一带一路' countries compare to the methods used for calculating the Municipal Human Development Index (MHDI) in Brazil?
Comparison.QuestionCn: ‘一带一路’国家的人类发展指数（HDI）数据收集方法与巴西市级人类发展指数（MHDI）计算所使用的方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The HDI data for '一带一路' countries is derived from the United Nations Development Programme's statistics, and missing data is supplemented through literature review and statistical methods like fitting and regression. In contrast, the MHDI in Brazil is calculated based on publicly available Brazilian census data, with a focus on sub-indices for education, income, and longevity.
Comparison.AnswerCn: “一带一路”国家的HDI数据来源于联合国开发计划署的统计数据，缺失的数据通过文献回顾和统计方法如拟合和回归进行补充。相比之下，巴西的MHDI是基于公开的巴西人口普查数据计算的，重点关注教育、收入和寿命的子指数。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What inferences can be made about the impact of missing data on the reliability and comprehensiveness of development indices across '一带一路' countries, and how might data fitting and regression techniques mitigate these impacts?
Interpretation.QuestionCn:
关于缺失数据对“一带一路”国家发展指数的可靠性和全面性的影响，可以得出以下推论：缺失数据可能导致发展指数的计算不准确，从而影响政策制定和资源分配的有效性。此外，缺失数据可能使得某些国家或地区的发展状况被低估或高估，进而影响整体的比较分析。

数据拟合和回归技术可以通过以下方式减轻这些影响：首先，这些技术可以帮助填补缺失数据，通过建立模型预测缺失值，从而提高数据的完整性。其次，回归分析可以揭示变量之间的关系，帮助理解缺失数据对结果的潜在影响，进而增强发展指数的可靠性。最后，这些技术还可以用于敏感性分析，评估缺失数据对最终结果的影响程度，从而为决策提供更为稳健的依据。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Missing data can reduce the reliability and comprehensiveness of development indices, potentially leading to biased or incomplete assessments of economic and social development across '一带一路' countries. Data fitting and regression techniques can help mitigate these impacts by estimating missing values, allowing for a more complete dataset that can better inform analysis and decision-making.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 缺失数据可能会降低发展指数的可靠性和全面性，从而导致对“一带一路”国家经济和社会发展的评估出现偏差或不完整。数据拟合和回归技术可以帮助减轻这些影响，通过估计缺失值，提供更完整的数据集，从而更好地为分析和决策提供信息。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of additional socio-economic factors, beyond the traditional sub-indices of education, income, and longevity, enhance the predictive accuracy of development indices in assessing regional development variations?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 将传统的教育、收入和寿命等子指数之外的额外社会经济因素整合进来，如何提高发展指数在评估区域发展差异时的预测准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating additional socio-economic factors could provide a more nuanced understanding of regional development variations, potentially enhancing the predictive accuracy of development indices. Such factors might include health infrastructure, employment rates, or access to technology, which could offer deeper insights into the complexities of development beyond the traditional sub-indices.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 整合额外的社会经济因素可以提供对区域发展差异更细致的理解，可能提高发展指数的预测准确性。这些因素可能包括健康基础设施、就业率或技术获取等，这些因素可以提供对发展复杂性的更深入洞察，超越传统的子指数。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for additional data collection and analysis when compiling the Human Development Index for countries along the Belt and Road Initiative?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在编制“一带一路”沿线国家的人类发展指数时，哪些因素促使需要额外的数据收集和分析？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for additional data collection and analysis arises from partial data gaps in the statistics published by the United Nations Development Programme. To address these gaps, researchers must engage in literature review and apply data fitting and regression techniques to provide comprehensive coverage for the 64+1 countries along the Belt and Road Initiative from 1990 to 2019.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于联合国开发计划署发布的统计数据存在部分数据缺口，因此需要进行额外的数据收集和分析。为了解决这些缺口，研究人员必须进行文献综述，并应用数据拟合和回归技术，以便为“一带一路”倡议下的64+1个国家在1990年至2019年期间提供全面的覆盖。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What challenges arise from using the Municipal Human Development Index as a predictor for election outcomes in Brazilian municipalities?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用市级人类发展指数作为巴西市镇选举结果预测的工具时，会出现哪些挑战？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges arise due to the novelty of using the development status of municipalities as predictors for election outcomes, with no prior work having been published in this specific context. The complexity of modeling election outcomes based on socioeconomic indicators like the Municipal Human Development Index and its sub-indices presents methodological difficulties that require careful consideration and validation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于将市政发展的状态作为选举结果预测因素的创新性，面临着挑战，因为在这个特定背景下没有先前的研究工作发表。基于社会经济指标，如市人类发展指数及其子指数，建模选举结果的复杂性带来了方法论上的困难，需要仔细考虑和验证。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the use of multiple data fitting and regression techniques impact the accuracy and reliability of the '一带一路'沿线国家人类发展指数 over the years?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多种数据拟合和回归技术的使用如何影响“一带一路”沿线国家人类发展指数的准确性和可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of various data fitting and regression techniques can improve the accuracy and reliability of the dataset by addressing data gaps and inconsistencies, leading to a more robust temporal analysis of human development trends.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用各种数据拟合和回归技术可以提高数据集的准确性和可靠性，通过解决数据缺口和不一致性，从而对人类发展趋势进行更稳健的时间分析。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can the HDI sub-indices for education, income, and longevity be effectively integrated into machine learning models to predict political outcomes?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何将教育、收入和寿命的HDI子指数有效地整合到机器学习模型中，以预测政治结果？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The HDI sub-indices for education, income, and longevity can be integrated into machine learning models by using them as potential predictors within supervised classification algorithms. These indices provide a detailed view of development status, which can be leveraged to predict outcomes, such as election results, by analyzing how different development dimensions correlate with political preferences.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: HDI的教育、收入和寿命子指数可以作为潜在预测变量，整合到机器学习模型中，应用于监督分类算法。这些指数提供了发展状态的详细视角，可以利用它们预测结果，例如通过分析不同发展维度与政治偏好的相关性来预测选举结果。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What data collection techniques are best suited for compiling a comprehensive dataset of Human Development Index metrics for cross-country comparisons along the '一带一路' initiative?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集技术最适合编制“一带一路”倡议下人类发展指数指标的综合数据集，以便进行跨国比较？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To compile a comprehensive dataset of Human Development Index metrics for cross-country comparisons, it is effective to use publicly available census data, complemented by data collection techniques such as literature reviews and statistical data fitting. This ensures that the dataset captures a broad and accurate representation of development indicators across different countries involved in the '一带一路' initiative.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了编制一个全面的人类发展指数指标数据集以进行跨国比较，使用公开的普查数据是有效的，同时辅以文献综述和统计数据拟合等数据收集技术。这确保了数据集能够广泛而准确地反映参与“一带一路”倡议的不同国家的发展指标。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of sub-indices within the Human Development Index enable more detailed analyses of socioeconomic development in '一带一路' countries?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 人类发展指数中使用的子指数如何使对“一带一路”国家的社会经济发展进行更详细的分析成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of sub-indices within the Human Development Index, like those for education, income, and longevity, enables detailed analyses by providing a comprehensive view of the development status, allowing for nuanced exploration of trends and disparities in socioeconomic factors.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 人类发展指数中的子指数，如教育、收入和寿命，使得通过提供全面的发展状态视角进行详细分析成为可能，从而能够对社会经济因素的趋势和差异进行细致的探讨。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What reasons could contribute to the difficulties in using the Human Development Index as a predictor for political election outcomes in municipalities?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用人类发展指数作为市级政治选举结果预测的困难可能有以下几个原因：
Expectation.AnswerEn: Difficulties could stem from the lack of published work using the development status of each municipality as a predictor, and the necessity of employing various supervised classification algorithms to assess the relationship between HDI and election results.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 困难可能源于缺乏使用每个市镇发展状态作为预测因素的已发布研究，以及需要采用多种监督分类算法来评估人类发展指数（HDI）与选举结果之间的关系。

Expectation.QuestionEn: How might data collection methods for the Human Development Index differ when accounting for socio-economic and political variables in '一带一路' countries?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在考虑“一带一路”国家的社会经济和政治变量时，人类发展指数的数据收集方法可能会有所不同。
Expectation.AnswerEn: Data collection methods may need to incorporate additional socio-economic and political variables, requiring nuanced fitting and regression techniques to manage incomplete data and potential expansions of the '一带一路' initiative.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法可能需要纳入额外的社会经济和政治变量，要求采用更为细致的拟合和回归技术，以管理不完整数据和“一带一路”倡议潜在扩展的问题。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential challenges in expanding a dataset to cover more countries along the '一带一路' initiative, and how might these challenges be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在扩展数据集以覆盖更多国家沿着“一带一路”倡议时，可能面临的挑战有哪些？这些挑战可能如何解决？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The potential challenges in expanding a dataset to cover more countries along the '一带一路' initiative include dealing with missing data, ensuring data consistency across different countries, and adapting to changes in the political or economic landscapes of these regions. These challenges might be addressed by using statistical methods such as data imputation and regression to fill gaps, collaborating with international organizations for standardized data collection, and continuously updating the dataset as new information and territories become relevant.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在扩展涵盖更多国家的“一带一路”倡议数据集时，可能面临的挑战包括处理缺失数据、确保不同国家之间的数据一致性，以及适应这些地区政治或经济环境的变化。可以通过使用统计方法如数据插补和回归分析来填补空白，与国际组织合作进行标准化数据收集，以及在新信息和新领域变得相关时持续更新数据集来应对这些挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you assess the role of literature review and data fitting techniques in enhancing the completeness and accuracy of a dataset, especially for regions with initially sparse data?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估文献综述和数据拟合技术在提高数据集的完整性和准确性方面的作用，特别是对于初始数据稀缺的地区？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Literature review and data fitting techniques play a crucial role in enhancing the completeness and accuracy of a dataset, particularly for regions with sparse data. These techniques allow researchers to identify and fill data gaps by extrapolating from existing information and leveraging insights from previous studies. By doing so, they improve the dataset's reliability and usefulness for analysis, although they also introduce the need for careful validation to ensure the integrity of the extrapolated data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 文献综述和数据拟合技术在增强数据集的完整性和准确性方面发挥着至关重要的作用，特别是在数据稀疏的地区。这些技术使研究人员能够识别并填补数据空白，通过从现有信息中外推并利用先前研究的见解来实现。通过这样做，它们提高了数据集的可靠性和分析的实用性，尽管这也引入了对仔细验证的需求，以确保外推数据的完整性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the Human Development Index data is adapted for different regions, like municipalities versus entire countries.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解人类发展指数数据是如何适应不同地区的，比如市镇与整个国家之间的差异。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The MHDI adapts the HDI to a municipal level by incorporating sub-indices for education, income, and longevity, offering a detailed view of development status specific to smaller regions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: MHDI通过纳入教育、收入和寿命的子指数，将HDI调整到市级，提供了针对较小地区发展状况的详细视图。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and elaborate on different data collection techniques used to fill the gaps in human development index data for the '一带一路' countries from 1990 to 2019.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别并详细说明用于填补1990年至2019年“一带一路”国家人类发展指数数据空白的不同数据收集技术。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The dataset was derived from the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) statistical data and included efforts to address missing data through literature review and data fitting, regression, and other processing steps.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该数据集来源于联合国开发计划署（UNDP）统计数据，并包括通过文献综述和数据拟合、回归及其他处理步骤来解决缺失数据的努力。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential strategies for expanding the human development index dataset to include more countries along the '一带一路' initiative, considering future expansions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨扩展人类发展指数数据集的潜在策略，以包括更多国家，特别是在“一带一路”倡议下，考虑未来的扩展。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The dataset can be expanded to include more countries by continuously increasing data coverage as the scope of the '一带一路' initiative grows, ensuring that new regions are incorporated into existing collection and analysis frameworks.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该数据集可以通过不断扩大数据覆盖范围来包括更多国家，以确保随着“一带一路”倡议的扩大，新地区被纳入现有的收集和分析框架中。
